  • Class
    Description
    AssistantCard
    The Assistant Cards are one of the key elements of the game.
    AssistantType
    This enumeration specifies all the existent Assistant Card types.
    CharacterCard
    The Character Cards are the notable addition to the Expert mode of a game.
    Cloud
    The cloud is one of the "physical" elements of the game.
    Color
    This enumeration specifies the existing colors for the game elements for which the color is a key factor.
    DoublyLinkedList
    This is the islands' data structure.
    Game
    This class is the core of the game model, as it holds all the values that describe its status.
    GameBoard
    This class contains all the "physical" elements of the game.
    GameExpertMode
    This class is the same as the Game class, but it handles Expert mode matches.
    Hall
    The Hall is a third of the School.
    Island
    The Island is one of the "physical" elements of the game.
    Player
    This class is the representation of a playing client in the game model.
    School
    The school is one of the "physical" elements of the game.
    Student
    The students are the "passive" protagonists of the game.
    Table
    The table is a part of the dining room, which is a third of a School.
    TowerColor
    This enumeration contains all the values representing the tower colors currently existing in the game.
    TowerRoom
    The tower room is a third of a School.
    Wizard
    This enumeration specifies the existing wizard IDs.
